notable_quotes: "this is only the first quarter of the game. if you call a time out, its on the field and done with dignity, you cant retreat into the locker room and send a note to the opposing side."
"I think much of this is your uncertainty and not hers. sorry. and yours is infectious"
"Going to treat it all as a game till I maybe see her in Beijing and out of character ignore and look past her bad behavior."
red_flags: Cryptic relationship advice using game metaphors
Discussion of 'exit strategy' for a relationship

analysis.summary: This email exchange shows J providing relationship advice to Larry Summers regarding an unnamed person, using sports metaphors to discuss communication strategies and relationship dynamics, with references to a potential meeting in Beijing and media interaction with the New Yorker.
